replies.author: andylizi
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 andylizi 于 2016-1-26 13:44 编辑 

DragonProxy - Let MCPE join ANY Minecraft PC/Mac servers
DragonProxy -让MCPE加入任何一个PC/MAC的Minecraft服务器


DragonProxy is a proxy for Minecraft: Pocket Edition/Windows 10 Edition connecting toMinecraft PC/Mac servers.
You can deploy this for your own server or use it at home joining servers like Hypixel. 
DragonProxy 是一个让Minecraft: Pocket Edition/Windows 10 Edition能进入Minecraft PC/MAC服务器的代理。你可以将其部署到你自己的服务器上或部署在家里来加入像Hypixel之类的服务器。


Note: Target server must be off-line mode for now, we may add online authentication later. 
Step 1. Install Java 8(or higher), download the JAR file.
Step 2. Set up a normal Minecraft PC/Mac server. You can also use Bukkit/Spigot/Glowstone/SpongeVanilla.
Step 3. Run the proxy by running command: java -Xmx256M -jar dragonproxy-x.x.x.jar where 256M indicates memory size and dragonproxy-x.x.x.jar is the file name.
Step 4. Close the server by typing stop in the console.
Step 5. Edit config.properties and change remote_ip and remote_port to your Minecraft PC/Mac server, such as 127.0.0.1 and 25565.
Step 6. Do Step 3 again, and you should be able to connect to a PC/Mac server through your computer/server from Pocket/Win 10 Edition.

安装步骤:


注意: 目标服务器目前必须是离线验证服务器，我们可能会在稍后添加正版服务器支持。安装Java8或更高的版本，下载JAR主程序你首先需要一个正常的Minecraft PC/MAC服务器。你也可以使用Bukkit/Spigot/Glowstone/SpongeVanilla服务端使用下列代码启动代理：java -Xmx256M -jar dragonproxy-x.x.x.jar复制代码256M是代理最大可以使用的内存， dragonproxy-x.x.x.jar是你下载的主程序名字在控制台输入stop关闭服务器编辑config.properties并更改remote_ip和remote_port为你的Minecraft服务器的ip和端口，比如127.0.0.1和25565再做一遍第三步，然后你应该就可以通过PE/Win10版连接PC/MAC服务器了


你可以在这里获取一个中文翻译文件
https://raw.githubusercontent.co ... nProxy-Translations

Title: DragonProxy -让MCPE加入任何一个PC/MAC的Minecraft服务器复制代码
body 's UBB code: 

[size=4]DragonProxy is a proxy for Minecraft: Pocket Edition/Windows 10 Edition connecting toMinecraft PC/Mac servers.[/size]
You can deploy this for your own server or use it at home joining servers like Hypixel. 
DragonProxy 是一个让[b]Minecraft: Pocket Edition/Windows 10 Edition[/b]能进入Minecraft PC/MAC服务器的代理。你可以将其部署到你自己的服务器上或部署在家里来加入像Hypixel之类的服务器。[/size]

Note: Target server must be off-line mode for now, we may add online authentication later. 
Step 1. Install Java 8(or higher), download the JAR file.
Step 2. Set up a normal Minecraft PC/Mac server. You can also use Bukkit/Spigot/Glowstone/SpongeVanilla.
Step 3. Run the proxy by running command: java -Xmx256M -jar dragonproxy-x.x.x.jar where 256M indicates memory size and dragonproxy-x.x.x.jar is the file name.
Step 4. Close the server by typing stop in the console.
Step 5. Edit config.properties and change remote_ip and remote_port to your Minecraft PC/Mac server, such as 127.0.0.1 and 25565.
Step 6. Do Step 3 again, and you should be able to connect to a PC/Mac server through your computer/server from Pocket/Win 10 Edition.

安装步骤:
[list]
注意: 目标服务器目前必须是离线验证服务器，我们可能会在稍后添加正版服务器支持。[*]安装Java8或更高的版本，下载JAR主程序
[*]你首先需要一个正常的Minecraft PC/MAC服务器。你也可以使用Bukkit/Spigot/Glowstone/SpongeVanilla服务端
[*]使用下列代码启动代理：java -Xmx256M -jar dragonproxy-x.x.x.jar
256M是代理最大可以使用的内存， dragonproxy-x.x.x.jar是你下载的主程序名字在控制台输入stop关闭服务器编辑config.properties并更改remote_ip和remote_port为你的Minecraft服务器的ip和端口，比如127.0.0.1 25565
[*]再做一遍第三步，然后你应该就可以通过PE/Win10版连接PC/MAC服务器了
[/list]

你可以在这里获取一个中文翻译文件
[url=https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DragonetMC/DragonProxy-Translations]https://raw.githubusercontent.co ... nProxy-Translations[/url]

replies.author: 桃渊林
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 hcrgm1 于 2016-1-24 04:24 编辑 
Note: Target server must be off-line mode for now, we may add online authentication later.

*.Step 1. Install Java 8(or higher), download the JAR file.

*.Step 2. Set up a normal Minecraft PC/Mac server. You can also use Bukkit/Spigot/Glowstone/SpongeVanilla.

*.Step 3. Run the proxy by running command: java -Xmx256M -jar dragonproxy-x.x.x.jar where 256M indicates memory size and dragonproxy-x.x.x.jar is the file name.

*.Step 4. Close the server by typing stop in the console.

*.Step 5. Edit config.properties and change remote_ip and remote_port to your Minecraft PC/Mac server, such as  127.0.0.1 and 25565.

*.Step 6. Do Step 3 again, and you should be able to connect to a PC/Mac server through your computer/server from Pocket/Win 10 Edition.
There is a better translation by me:)

注意：到目前为止，目标服务器必须关闭正版模式，我们可能在以后添加在线认证的支持。
*.第一步：安装Java 8(或更高版本)，下载JAR程序。
*.第二步：安装好正常的Minecraft PC/Mac服务器，您可以使用Bukkit/Spigot/Glowstone/SpongeVanilla来开服。
*.第三步：用这个命令来运行DragonProxy：
java -Xmx256M -jar dragonproxy-x.x.x.jar复制代码
256M表示内存大小，dragonproxy-x.x.x.jar是JAR文件名。
*.第四步：在DragonProxy控制台用stop命令来关服。
*.第五步：编辑DragonProxy的config.properties文件，将remote_ip和remote_port改成你的Minecraft PC/Mac服务器上的 ，比如127.0.0.1(服务器地址)和25565(端口号).
*.第六步：再次执行第三个步骤，然后你就应该能够从手机版/Win 10版连接到您的服务器了:)。If you are noticed for login faliure, disconnect and re-connect then perform this process again.
I think there are some errors, there should be change like this:
如果您注意到登录失败，请试试断开连接和重新连接然后再执行本过程。警告：我们不保证使用编辑dragonproxy捕捉你的密码，所以要小心，只有加入到受信任的服务器的黑客。警告：我们不保证黑客会通过DragonProxy来取得您的密码，所以要小心，请加入到您信任的服务器。

Minecraft基岩版1.5.0有了水域更新，但是JAVA版的Minecraft没有水域更新,所以一旦在PE上触发了游泳动作，就会因为触发服务器的反作弊而踢出服务器


Minecraft Bedrock Edition version 1.5.0 has a water update, but the JAVA version of Minecraft does not update the waters, so once the swim action is triggered on the PE, you will be kicked out by the server because it triggers server cheats.
